Docs CLI

Directory Structure

Flux follows a fix directory structure. It looks somewhat similar to jekyll directory structure. 

                            .
                            ├── _site
                            ├── assets
                            ├── blog.html
                            ├── config.json
                            ├── css
                            ├── index.html
                            ├── posts
                            └── templates

Project by Khushmeet , built with Go.
